name:
Harvest Moon®:
The Lost Valley
description:
Restore the seasons and build your
farm, your way, in this farming
adventure for Nintendo 3DS family
systems! In this title, create your ideal
farm by planting seeds and caring for
animals. Explore a fully 3D world and
shape the land by digging pits, raising
mountains and creating new paths to
make your farm exactly the way you
want it. You can also trade and build
relationships with visitors to your farm
– you might even find love!
